oai_dc:dc.dc:title: James C. Mates discharge certificate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Discharge certificate for James C. Mates, Private, Company A, 101st Regiment Pennsylvania Volunteer Infantry, USA. Mates enlisted on August 25, 1862 for a period of three years. He was captured and survived Andersonville prison. James C. Mates' diary is available on microfilm as TSLA Mf. 1972.
